oauth_2.0.description: Complete OAuth 2.0 server implementation with Laravel Passport

features: TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) using Google Authenticator
QR code generation for easy setup
Token refresh for providers that support it
Export in CSV, JSON, Excel formats
Role-based access control (RBAC) with organization context
API response caching (300-600s for read endpoints)
Database indexes on all foreign keys
Background job processing for heavy operations
Optimized middleware stack (4 middleware for API requests)
